markdownRemark.html:
• Cake

    • 4 eggs
    • 3 dl caster suger
    • 3 dl all purpose flour
    • 2 tsp baking powder
    • 1 tsp soda bicarbona
    • 2 tsp cinnamon
    • 1 tsp cardamom
    • 1 tsp ginger
    • vanilla extract
    • little salt
    • 1 1/2 dl neutral oil
    • 6 dl grated carrots
    • lemon juice

  • Frosting

    • 150 g Philadelpha cheese
    • 75 g room temperature butter
    • 1 dl powder sugar
    • little vanilla extract

Watch the video :)

Bake for 40-45 minutes at 170 C.
markdownRemark.rawMarkdownBody:
- Cake
  - **4** eggs
  - **3 dl** caster suger
  - **3 dl** all purpose flour
  - **2 tsp** baking powder
  - **1 tsp** soda bicarbona
  - **2 tsp** cinnamon
  - **1 tsp** cardamom
  - **1 tsp** ginger
  - vanilla extract
  - little salt
  - **1 1/2 dl** neutral oil
  - **6 dl** grated carrots
  - lemon juice
- Frosting
  - **150 g** Philadelpha cheese
  - **75 g** room temperature butter
  - **1 dl** powder sugar
  - little vanilla extract

Watch the video :)

Bake for 40-45 minutes at 170 C.
